text: Ravinder Singh Brahampura is an Indian politician from the state of Punjab. ==Constituency== Brahmpura represented the Khadoor Sahib Assembly Constituency of Punjab. ==Political Party== Brahmpura is a member of Shiromani Akali Dal (Taksali) and a former member of the Shiromani Akali Dal.| url=http://www.hindustantimes.com/punjab/ravinder-singh-brahmpura-wins- khadoor-sahib-bypoll/story-b3K9TSSzhh0fV9w7B2K6mM.html | title=SAD candidate Ravinder Singh Brahmpura wins Khadoor Sahib bypoll | work=hindustantimes.com | accessdate=29 July 2016}} == References == Category:People from Punjab, India Category:Shiromani Akali Dal politicians Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Shiromani Akali Dal (Taksali) politicians
title: Ravinder Singh Brahmpura
